title: Classic Chocolate Cake

description: Tangy lemon cake with a sweet, zesty lemon glaze.

description: Decadent chocolate cake layered with cherries and whipped cream.

description: Moist coconut cake layered with coconut frosting and shredded coconut.

description: Vanilla cake filled with colorful sprinkles, perfect for celebrations.
